summary:
Egbert Hoving has 14 years of field experience in rural development, agricultural extension and project management. In 1986 he joined ICCO, a Dutch non-governmental funding agency, where he has gained extensive experience with assessment of a wide variety of funding applications and monitoring of development projects in various African countries. Gradually he has become more involved and specialized in market-oriented agricultural development, capacity enhancement of farmer organisations and promotion of farmer entrepreneurship.

Specialties: Promotion of farmer entrepreneurship, capacity enhancement of farmer organisations and value chain development.
